item.title: Simple HTTP Server Using Python
item.author: juneardoc@gmail.com (Clavin June)
item.description: Sunday Snippet #1 simple HTTP server using python Opening simple HTTP server using python 1 2 3 # python3 -m http.server <port> $ python3 -m http.server 8080 Serving HTTP on :: port 8080 (http://[::]:8080/) ...
